overview: Minji, who lost her sister resin to a gangster, plunged into the evil lair, but fell into the traps of Dalho's party and became a prostitute. It is a place where inhuman exploitation and demolition are taking place and various miserable events follow. Min - ji 's lover, Jun - yeop, found her at a nightlife and entertainment complex, but she was stopped by the violence of the Dalho - dang party. Minji, full of hatred, seduces and kills Dalho. Afterwards, he escapes the pimp house with the new dragon. Finally, Jun - yeop clears the pimp with the police. There is Jun-yeop in the side of Min-ji who gives a mass along with the longevity of her sister in a long time.
title: Red Colored Woman
